message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I think a 50/50 split is more fair, considering we both want the best deal.
Bob, my friend, this deal gets worse for both of us every round. Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need you to move up.
